core.jwt package¶

core.jwt.base module¶

class core.jwt.base.JWTManager(algorithm: Optional[str] = None, options: Optional[dict] = None, verify: Optional[bool] = None, key: str = '')¶

Bases: object

JWTManager is the base class of jwt.

decode(jwt: str, key: Optional[str] = None, verify: Optional[bool] = None, algorithm: Optional[str] = None, options: Optional[dict] = None, **kwargs: dict) → dict¶

Decoding the income token.

Args:
jwt (str): captured jwt. key (str, optional): secret key. Defaults to None. verify (bool, optional): flag for specifying to ensuring validation of income jwt or not. Defaults to None. algorithm (str, optional): jwt algorithn. Defaults to None. options (dict, optional): jwt various options. Defaults to None.
Raises:
HTTPException: 401, Invalid Token. HTTPException: 401, Expired Token.
Returns:
dict: decoded token.
encode(payload: Any, key: Optional[str] = None, algorithm: str = 'HS256', headers: Optional[dict] = None, json_encoder: Optional[json.encoder.JSONEncoder] = None) → str¶

Encoding the income payload

Args:
payload (Any): jwt payload to get encode. key (str, optional): secret key. Defaults to None. algorithm (str, optional): jwt algorithm. Defaults to “HS256”. headers (dict, optional): jwt headers for some special validations. Defaults to None. json_encoder (JSONEncoder, optional): json encoder interface. Defaults to None.
Returns:
str: encoded token

core.jwt.helper module¶

core.jwt.helper.token_required(manager: core.jwt.base.JWTManager, location: str = 'header') → Callable¶

token required decorator or dependency for fastapi

Args:
manager (JWTManager): jwt manager instance location (str, optional): distenation of lookuping the token from request . Defaults to “header”.
Returns:
Callable: function to decode the income token.

Module contents¶

JWT Plugin is a jwt manager to manage jwt for fastapi.

class core.jwt.JWTManager(algorithm: Optional[str] = None, options: Optional[dict] = None, verify: Optional[bool] = None, key: str = '')¶

Bases: object

JWTManager is the base class of jwt.

decode(jwt: str, key: Optional[str] = None, verify: Optional[bool] = None, algorithm: Optional[str] = None, options: Optional[dict] = None, **kwargs: dict) → dict¶

Decoding the income token.

Args:
jwt (str): captured jwt. key (str, optional): secret key. Defaults to None. verify (bool, optional): flag for specifying to ensuring validation of income jwt or not. Defaults to None. algorithm (str, optional): jwt algorithn. Defaults to None. options (dict, optional): jwt various options. Defaults to None.
Raises:
HTTPException: 401, Invalid Token. HTTPException: 401, Expired Token.
Returns:
dict: decoded token.

Encoding the income payload

payload (Any): jwt payload to get encode. key (str, optional): secret key. Defaults to None. algorithm (str, optional): jwt algorithm. Defaults to “HS256”. headers (dict, optional): jwt headers for some special validations. Defaults to None. json_encoder (JSONEncoder, optional): json encoder interface. Defaults to None.

core.jwt.token_required(manager: core.jwt.base.JWTManager, location: str = 'header') → Callable¶

token required decorator or dependency for fastapi

Args:
manager (JWTManager): jwt manager instance location (str, optional): distenation of lookuping the token from request . Defaults to “header”.
Returns:
Callable: function to decode the income token.
